author: Rosemarie Bernardo
title: 4 confirmed killed in crash of contractor’s helicopter on Kauai’s Pacific Missile Range Facility
content:
UPDATE: 5 p.m.
Chris Turner, owner and captain of Na Pali Riders, a company that offers Zodiac raft tours along the Na Pali Coast, witnessed the crash.
Turner said the helicopter flew over him and … [+4186 chars]
